text: The 2015–16 Orlando Magic season was the 27th season of the franchise in the National Basketball Association (NBA). They began the season hoping to improve upon their 25–57 output the previous season. They managed to improve by 10 games, finishing 35–47, but had missed the playoffs for a fourth straight year. ==Draft picks== {| class="wikitable sortable sortable" ! style="background:#007CC5; color:white" width="10%"| Round ! style="background:#007CC5; color:white" width="10%"| Pick ! style="background:#007CC5; color:white" width="20%"| Player ! style="background:#007CC5; color:white" width="15%"| Position ! style="background:#007CC5; color:white" width="15%"| Nationality ! style="background:#007CC5; color:white" width="20%"| College |- style="text- align: center" | 1 | 5 | Mario Hezonja | SG / SF | | Barcelona |- style="text- align: center" | 2 | 51 | Tyler Harvey | PG / SG | | Eastern Washington |} ==Pre-season== |- style="background:#fbb;" | 1 | October 3 | Charlotte | 100–106 | Andrew Nicholson (23) | Andrew Nicholson (8) | C.
